main event: On 27 October 1958, Mr. and Mrs. York observed an unidentified flying object over their farm near Uniondale, PA.
interesting points: The object was described as a large gray cigar with a horizontal crosspiece resembling an elevator on its tail., The sighting reported the object flying at a high rate of speed, just below the treetops., The object made a loud rushing sound during its flight., The witnesses were unable to provide specific details about the time of the sighting or the weather conditions., No photographs were taken or included in the report.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. York, residents of Uniondale, PA
